inkball

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, Tile

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all game objects in the InkBall game. Provides common properties and methods for position and distance calculation.

    • Field Summary
